description: square accordion folded paper with, "Meeting #13 / Jonathan Monk" on the front; unfolds into banner with bold black text; color postcard with a picture of a yellow mailbox on a post with a bicycle and street in background, signed by the artist and addressed to Kosmas; also includes two invoices, an envelope with "Meeting #13" in teal lettering, and a ticket stub; contained in Collection Lambert mailing envelope; lender's archive # 58
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Postcard
